exercises.explanation: Use 'Koja' (which - feminine singular) to ask about feminine nouns like 'boja' (color).
Use 'Tko' (who) to ask about a person's identity.
Use 'Koje' (which - masculine plural) for the plural masculine noun 'jezici' (languages).
Use 'Što' (what) when asking about things or making a choice between objects.
Use 'Što' (what) when asking about abstract things that affect someone.
